Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale and distribution of powdered pure caffeine
Summary: Prohibits the sale and distribution of powdered pure caffeine.
LawCode: Add Art 33-B §§3398 - 3398-c, Pub Health L; add §390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of powdered pure caffeine
